本.definition: (bound form) root; stem; (bound form) origin; source; (bound form) one's own; this; (bound form) this; the current (year etc); (bound form) original; (bound form) inherent; originally; initially; capital; principal; classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

本·拉登.definition: Osama bin Laden (1957-2011), leader of Al Qaeda

本人.definition: I; me; myself; oneself; yourself; himself; herself; the person concerned

本位.definition: standard; one's own department or unit

本位貨幣.definition: local currency; our own currency; abbr. to 本幣|本币

本來.definition: original; originally; at first; it goes without saying; of course

本來面目.definition: (idiom) true colors; true features; original appearance

本傑明·富蘭克林.pinyin: běn jié míng · fù lán kè lín
本傑明·富蘭克林.definition: Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), American writer, scientist, inventor, politician and diplomat

本分.definition: (to play) one's part; one's role; one's duty; (to stay within) one's bounds; dutiful; keeping to one's role

本初子午線.definition: the first meridian; the prime meridian

本利.definition: principal and interest; capital and profit

本名.definition: original name; real name; (of foreigners) first name; given name

本命年.definition: year of one's birth sign, according to the cycle of 12 animals of the earthly branches 地支[di4 zhi1]

本因坊.definition: Honinbo, major school of Go in Japan (1612-1940); title held by the winner of the Honinbo Go tournament (1941-)

本固枝榮.definition: when the root is firm, the branches flourish

本土.definition: one's native country; native; local; metropolitan territory

本土派.definition: local faction; pro-localization faction (in Taiwanese politics)

本地管理界面.pinyin: běn dì guǎn lǐ jiè miàn

本子.definition: book; notebook; Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"; CL:本[ben3]; edition

本字.definition: original form of a Chinese character

本家.definition: a member of the same clan; a distant relative with the same family name

本尊.definition: (Buddhism) yidam (one's chosen meditational deity); the principal object of worship on a Buddhist altar; (of a monk who has the ability to appear in multiple places at the same time) the honored one himself (contrasted with his alternate forms, 分身[fen1 shen1]); (fig.) (jocular) the genuine article; the real McCoy; the man himself; the woman herself; the original manifestation of sth (not a spin-off or a clone)

本小利微.definition: (of a small business) to have very little capital and very modest profits

本州.definition: Honshū, the main island of Japan

本幣.definition: local currency; our own currency; abbr. for 本位貨幣|本位货币

本徵值.definition: eigenvalue (math.); also written 特徵值|特征值

本徵向量.definition: eigenvector (math.); also written 特徵向量|特征向量

本性難移.definition: It is hard to change one's essential nature (idiom). You can't change who you are.; Can the leopard change his spots? (Jeremiah 13:23)

本拉登.definition: (Osama) bin Laden (1957-2011), leader of Al Qaeda

本文.definition: this text; article; the main body of a book

本期.definition: the current period; this term (usually in finance)

本末.definition: the whole course of an event from beginning to end; ins and outs; the fundamental and the incidental

本末倒置.definition: lit. to invert root and branch (idiom); fig. confusing cause and effect; to stress the incidental over the fundamental; to put the cart before the horse

本業.definition: business in which a company has traditionally engaged (e.g. before diversifying); original business; core business; (literary) agriculture

本溪市.definition: Benxi, prefecture-level city in Liaoning Province 遼寧省|辽宁省[Liao2ning2 Sheng3]

本溪滿族自治縣.pinyin: běn xī mǎn zú zì zhì xiàn
本溪滿族自治縣.definition: Benxi Manchu Autonomous County in Benxi 本溪市[Ben3xi1 Shi4], Liaoning

本省人.definition: people of this province; (in Taiwan) Han Chinese people other than those who moved to Taiwan from mainland China after 1945 and their descendants

本篤十六世.definition: Pope Benedict XVI, original name Joseph Alois Ratzinger (1927-2022), pope 2005-2013

本罪.definition: actual sin (Christian notion, as opposed to original sin 原罪)

本茨.definition: Benz (name); Karl Benz (1844-1929), motor car pioneer

本草.definition: a book on Chinese (herbal) medicine; Chinese materia medica

本草綱目.definition: Compendium of Medical Herbs 1596, compiled by Li Shizhen 李時珍|李时珍[Li3 Shi2 zhen1]

本著.definition: based on...; in conformance with..; taking as one's main principle

本質.definition: essence; nature; innate character; intrinsic quality

本那比.definition: see 本那比市[Ben3 na4 bi3 shi4]

本錢.definition: capital; (fig.) asset; advantage; the means (to do sth)

本領.definition: skill; ability; capability; CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]

本題.definition: the subject under discussion; the point at issue

本體.definition: main part; torso; the thing in itself; noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
